segments.text: Hello , this is Francis from XYZ Company . I would like to discuss with you about a new project some time next week . Do you have time to meet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I am not sure . Lets me check my agenda
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am free on Tuesday afternoon from 2 PM to 4 PM , is it convenient for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It is ok with me . So I will be arriving at your office around 2 fifteen PM . Do you have a projector in your room ? I would like to show you some related charts
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , there is . See you then .
segments.speaker: S2
